name: Shelldom DEMO
description:
Shelldom is a bullet-hell RPG inspired by games such as Undertale, Deltarune, Everhood, and more!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move, and Z to interact!

There is 4 fights and 1 area to explore (one of these fights may be a little hard to find)

This is a short demo build of a potentially larger project, however besides some minor patches this project will most likely be on pause for awhile.

NOTE: the game does not feature a save system
